items.sentence: I asked Tom to email me the pictures he took yesterday.
I balanced my checkbook while you were washing clothes.
Tom doesn\'t really listen when Mary is talking to him.
Tom doesn\'t really plan to stay up all night, does he?
Tom doesn\'t speak French as well as he speaks English.
Tom doesn\'t think Mary would do what you said she did.
Are you sure it was Tom who taught Mary how to do that?
Tom is the only person who can show you how to do that.
Tom is the only student at this school that Mary knows.
I used to be able to speak French better than I do now.
Tom wondered what could have made Mary change her mind.
Many people who have diabetes don\'t know they have it.
As I\'ve just explained, Tom won\'t be going to Boston.
Tom told me that he thought that Mary would be at home.
I thought it would be fun for us to go skiing together.
I thought you guys were planning on coming to my party.
I still have a lot of questions that I want to ask you.
I stopped laughing as soon as I noticed Tom was crying.
Just the other day, Tom and Mary came over for a visit.
The only one here who knows how to speak French is Tom.
The painting on the wall above the fireplace is by Tom.
There was no doubt in my mind that Tom knew the answer.
Which side of the plate is the spoon supposed to be on?
Tom didn\'t seem to be as popular as Mary seemed to be.
Tom didn\'t seem to be as relaxed as Mary seemed to be.
Tom didn\'t seem to be as serious as Mary seemed to be.
Tom didn\'t seem to be as sincere as Mary seemed to be.
Tom didn\'t seem to be as thirsty as Mary seemed to be.
Tom and I didn\'t do what we\'ve been accused of doing.
You\'re one of Tom\'s friends from school, aren\'t you?
When was the last time you spoke to somebody in French?
I don\'t know how long it\'ll take us to get to Boston.
Tom was foolish enough to believe everything Mary said.
Tom was the only one in the classroom when I got there.
I don\'t think I\'m tall enough to reach the top shelf.
I assume that you\'ve heard about what happened to Tom.
I think Tom would like the way you decorated this room.
I don\'t know for certain whether Tom will swim or not.
I don\'t know why Tom wants me to meet him in the park.
Perhaps we shouldn\'t have gone to Boston last weekend.
I still haven\'t gotten over the shock of Tom\'s death.
Tom said he didn\'t think Mary had ever been to Boston.
Tom said he\'d love to go to Boston with us in October.
I suspect Tom isn\'t planning to go to Boston with you.
I talked to Tom\'s ex-wife about why they got divorced.
I think I\'m supposed to be helping Tom this afternoon.
Tom said he usually goes to Boston three times a month.
When did you first notice that your wallet was missing?
The teacher didn\'t let the students ask any questions.
I don\'t think Tom knows why Mary is scared of his dog.
Tom didn\'t have enough time to do what had to be done.
What\'s the best Christmas present you\'ve ever gotten?
Tom knew that Mary wanted him to go to Boston with her.
I don\'t remember you saying anything about Tom coming.
I don\'t think Tom is smart enough to get into Harvard.
I don\'t think Tom will be awake at this time of night.
Tom called Mary up and asked her what her schedule was.
Tom is looking for someone to teach French to his kids.
Tom is paid double time on Sundays and public holidays.
Tom is planning a big surprise birthday party for Mary.
Tom was supposed to be at school today, but he wasn\'t.
Tom lost the book that he\'d borrowed from the library.
I don\'t know how you stayed in that job all this time.
The street outside Tom\'s apartment building was quiet.
You don\'t really think Tom would hurt himself, do you?
You don\'t really think Tom would kill himself, do you?
You should\'ve apologized to Tom for calling him names.
Your mother must\'ve been beautiful when she was young.
I haven\'t even thought about what I might do tomorrow.
I haven\'t yet met the family Tom lived with in Boston.
It looks like I might have to go to Boston next summer.
Tom brought Mary a drink and placed it in front of her.
Tom buried himself under his blanket and went to sleep.
My school is about ten minutes\' walk from the station.
Tom decided to adopt a cat from a local animal shelter.
Tom explained to Mary why he couldn\'t go to her party.
Tom is looking more and more like his father every day.
Tom walked around the car and opened the door for Mary.
I should\'ve advised Tom not to believe what Mary says.
Where would you like to be living three years from now?
You should tell Tom that he has nothing to worry about.
Tom definitely knew that he shouldn\'t have eaten that.
Tom made an appointment to meet Mary the following day.
Tom may do whatever he likes with the money I gave him.
Tom probably doesn\'t know why the picnic was canceled.
A committee has been set up to investigate the problem.
It was definitely Tom that I saw yesterday in the park.
Let\'s see what else we can find out about that matter.
You aren\'t the only one who has had problems with Tom.
If you\'ve had a lot to drink, it\'s best not to drive.
It can\'t hurt for you to spend a little time with Tom.
It doesn\'t really matter whether Tom does that or not.
Tom pretended not to know anything about the situation.
It seems that your dog has taken quite a liking to Tom.
Tom woke up when he heard someone knocking on the door.
Tom has always been there for me whenever I needed him.
Tom says he has something he needs to discuss with you.
Tom says he wants to do the same thing I did in Boston.
Tom said he wasn\'t planning to go to Boston next week.
Tom hasn\'t been told that he doesn\'t need to do that.
